#summary How to install the customizations
= Introduction =

This page gives a brief overview of how to install the customizations into an installed instance of alfresco


= Details =

The easiest way is to use the install script scripts/install.sh

To install using the Alfresco user repository then just run as 'install.sh'

To install with CAS integration run as:
install.sh <<alfresco server>> <<CAS server>>

e.g.
install.sh alfresco.example.org cas.example.org
